attributes.action: Declare a national emergency and stop all illegal boats entering British waters.
attributes.additional_details: The United Kingdom is under invasion by illegal immigrants and it needs to stop immediately.
attributes.background: Return all illegal boards back to the nearest beach in France.

rejection.details:
It is not clear what you mean in regards to declaring a national emergency and what sort of impact you would like this to have.

You could start petition calling for the Government to be given emergency powers to address illegal immigration, if that's what you'd like.

You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Publish a detailed plan to tackle illegal migration and stop boat crossings: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709678

Send the navy into the channel to help stop illegal migrants entering the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
